cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)

project(open62541)

add_subdirectory(libopen62541)

include_directories(
        ./libopen62541
)

add_executable(open62541-client
        ./client.cpp
        )

set(PLATFORM_LIBS)
if (WIN32)
    set(PLATFORM_LIBS ws2_32)
endif ()

target_link_libraries(open62541-client
        libopen62541
        ${PLATFORM_LIBS}
        )

# add_executable(open62541-server)
